project_preview_description.text: A full-stack application for users to purchase books online. Designed for easy library management tasks.

project_description.text: The eBook is a web app built to help with the process of students buying course materials. It provides a fast way for teachers to provide students details of which is required for course material.

The app was designed for a simple task helping students to buys books online. The main concept here is that students who are enrolled in the course can check the required book they need to buy. Although, from teacher dashboard teachers are allowed to post and edit the book (teacher's dashboard is not available in this project for now). In the future, the app will increase its functionality to purchase the book and will have a teacher dashboard where the teacher can upload PDF copies of the coursebook as well.
The main goal was to make the database efficient and fast with interactive UI since everything was being built from scratch.
The solution was very simple, follow industry-standard methods to create wireframes and schema requirements to find loopholes before jumping into the development.

This web app lets users login in into the system with their own account. PHP does the magic for logging users into the system and logging out using sessions. This app used relational databases using SQL, all tables are in 3NF and BCNF form to make database fast and efficient. The interactive UI is created using JavaScript libraries and advanced HTML/CSS.
